General.Name: Crimson Tide plc
General.Description: Crimson Tide plc provides mobility solutions and related software development services primarily in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It provides mpro5, a mobile business solution that provides software, Windows Azure cloud infrastructure, and installation and support, as well as job scheduling, alerting, and reporting services. The company is also involved in reselling third party software, and related development and support services. Crimson Tide plc was incorporated in 1911 and is based in Tunbridge Wells, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Brockbourne House, Tunbridge Wells, United Kingdom, TN4 8BS
